SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Please check one box to show how you describe your current health.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Description of Your Current Health

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - I cough.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Cough

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - I bring up phlegm (sputum).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Bring Up Phlegm

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - I have shortness of breath.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Have Shortness of Breath

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - I have attacks of wheezing.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Have Attacks of Wheezing

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - How many respiratory attacks did you have during the last year?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Number of Respiratory Attacks Last Year

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SGRQC1-How Often Do You Have Good Days
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - How often do you have good days (with few respiratory problems)?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Good Days with Few Respiratory Problems

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - If you wheeze, is it worse when you get up in the morning?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Wheezing Worse In the Morning

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - How would you describe your respiratory problems?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Description of Your Respiratory Problems

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about what activities usually make you feel breathless: Washing or dressing yourself.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Feel Breathless Washing or Dressing Yourself

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about what activities usually make you feel breathless: Walking around the house.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Feel Breathless Walking Around the House

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about what activities usually make you feel breathless: Walking outside on level ground.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Feel Breathless Walking Outside on Level Ground

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SGRQC1-Walking Up a Flight of Stairs
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about what activities usually make you feel breathless: Walking up a flight of stairs.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Feel Breathless Walking Up a Flight of Stairs

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about what activities usually make you feel breathless: Walking up hills.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Feel Breathless Walking Up Hills

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Some more questions about your cough and breathlessness: Coughing hurts.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Coughing Hurts

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Some more questions about your cough and breathlessness: Coughing makes me tired.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Coughing Makes Me Tired

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Some more questions about your cough and breathlessness: I am short of breath when I talk.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Short of Breath When Talk

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SGRQC1-Short of Breath When Bend Over
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Some more questions about your cough and breathlessness: I am short of breath when I bend over.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Short of Breath When Bend Over

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Some more questions about your cough and breathlessness: My coughing or breathing disturbs my sleep.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Coughing Disturbs My Sleep

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Some more questions about your cough and breathlessness: I get exhausted easily.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Get Exhausted Easily

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: My cough or breathing is embarrassing in public.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Cough Is Embarrassing in Public

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: My respiratory problems are a nuisance to my family, friends or neighbours.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Respiratory Problems a Nuisance to Family, Friends or Neighbours

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: I get afraid or panic when I cannot catch my breath.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Afraid or Panic When Cannot Catch Breath

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SGRQC1-Not in Control of Resp Problems
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: I feel that I am not in control of my respiratory problems.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Not in Control of Respiratory Problems

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: I have become frail or an invalid because of my respiratory problems.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Become Frail Because of Respiratory Problems

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SGRQC1-Exercise Is Not Safe for Me
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: Exercise is not safe for me.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Exercise Is Not Safe for Me

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - Questions about other effects that your respiratory problems may have on you: Everything seems too much of an effort.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Everything Seems Too Much Effort

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SGRQC1-Take a Long Time to Get Washed
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: I take a long time to get washed or dressed.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Take a Long Time to Get Washed or Dressed

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SGRQC1-Cannot Take a Bath or Shower
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: I cannot take a bath or shower, or I take a long time to do it.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Cannot Take a Bath or Shower

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SGRQC1-Walk Slow Than Others My Age
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: I walk slower than other people my age, or I stop to rest.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Walk Slower Than Other People My Age

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: Jobs such as household chores take a long time, or I have to stop to rest.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Jobs Take a Long Time

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SGRQC1-Walk Up Flight of Stairs Slowly
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: If I walk up one flight of stairs, I have to go slowly or stop.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Walk Up Flight of Stairs Slowly

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SGRQC1-If I Hurry, I Have to Stop
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: If I hurry or walk fast, I have to stop or slow down.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - If Walk Fast Have to Stop

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: My breathing makes it difficult to do things such as walk up hills, carry things up stairs, light gardening such as weeding, dance, bowl or play golf.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Difficult to Walk Up Hills

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - These are questions about how your activities might be affected by your respiratory problems: My breathing makes it difficult to do things such as carry heavy loads, dig in the garden or shovel snow, jog or walk briskly (5 miles per hour), play tennis or swim.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Difficult to Carry Heavy Loads

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot play sports or do other physical activities.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Respiratory Problems Affect Daily Life: Cannot Play Sports

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot go out for entertainment or recreation.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Respiratory Problems Affect Daily Life: Cannot Go Out for Entertainment

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SGRQC1-Cannot Go Out to Do Shopping
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot go out of the house to do the shopping.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Respiratory Problems Affect Daily Life: Cannot Go Out to Do Shopping

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot do household chores.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Respiratory Problems Affect Daily Life: Cannot Do Household Chores

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SGRQC1-Cannot Move Far From My Bed
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - We would like to know how your respiratory problems usually affect your daily life: I cannot move far from my bed or chair.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - Respiratory Problems Affect Daily Life: Cannot Move Far From Bed

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: St. George's Respiratory Questionnaire - How do your respiratory problems affect you?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SGRQ-C - How Respiratory Problems Affect You
